title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2018
content:
20thApril,2018 Statutory Instruments 497
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.33 OF2018
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(ActNo.35of2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2018
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsection125oftheElectoral
ProcessAct,2016,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Elections)(ElectionDateandTimeofPoll)Order,
2018.
2. Acandidateforelectionasacouncillorinthewardssetout Dateand
intheScheduleshalllodgeanominationwiththereturningofficer timeof
nominations
onThursday,3rdMay,2018,between0900hoursand1500hours. forelection
3. ThecampaignperiodshallcommenceonThursday,3rdMay, Campaign
period
2018 at1500hoursandcloseat1800hoursonMonday,4thJune,
2018.
4. (1) Thepollfortheelectionofacouncillorinthewardsset Electiondate
out in the Schedule shall take place onTuesday, 5th June, 2018, andtimeof
poll
between0600hoursand1800hours.
(2) Apollshallnotbetakeninawardifonlyonecandidateis
validlynominated.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
498 Statutory Instruments 27thApril,2018

(Paragraphs2and4)

Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this 18th day of
April,2018.
JUSTICE E.E. CHULU,
Chairperson
